Header: Bâ€™desh Defence Adviser Pays Courtesy Call
Content: Commodore Syed Maksumul Hakim, Defence Adviser at Bangladesh High Commission in Sri Lanka paid a courtesy call on Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander Security Forces - Central on Monday (6) during a visit to the area. During this cordial meeting, both of them shared thoughts on bilateral understanding and cooperation that prevail between both organizations. At the end of the meeting, the Commander SF-Cen presented a memento to the visiting Defence Adviser.
